title: Dragoș Străinu's blog
description: I am Dragoș (Dragosh), a Front-end Software Engineer, Hackathoner, OSS enthusiast.

items.content_html: To win first place at a hackathon, you need to combine multiple components... and that's not always possible. Here's how to make the most of your next hackathon without coming in 'first place'.
